column1: The Pit Room////Couple of Chicagoans visiting Houston checking out some barbecue places to eat
column2: and we come across this gem! People were nice and friendly and very helpful in our menu choices. The brisket tacos were amazing
column3: with a nice spicy kick and the sides
column4: mac n cheese and potato salad
column5: topped them off well. I'll be coming back on my next visit to Houston!
